title: A Record Lookup
description: Resolve a domain to its IPv4 address.

title: AAAA Lookup
description: Resolve a domain to its IPv6 address.

title: CNAME Lookup
description: Find the canonical name (alias) for a domain.

title: MX Lookup
description: Verify mail exchange servers and priority.

title: TXT Lookup
description: Retrieve text records used for verification (SPF, Google).

title: NS Lookup
description: Identify authoritative name servers.

title: SOA Lookup
description: View Start of Authority zone information.

title: SRV Lookup
description: Locate services like SIP or Minecraft servers.

title: Reverse DNS (PTR)
description: Resolve an IP address back to a hostname.

title: CAA Lookup
description: Check Certificate Authority Authorization policies.

title: DNSKEY Lookup
description: Retrieve public keys for DNSSEC verification.

title: DS Lookup
description: Check Delegation Signer records for DNSSEC.

title: SPF Validator
description: Check and validate Sender Policy Framework records.

title: DMARC Validator
description: Validate DMARC policy for email authentication.

title: DKIM Validator
description: Retrieve DomainKeys Identified Mail public keys.

title: BIMI Validator
description: Check Brand Indicators for Message Identification.

title: MTA-STS Validator
description: Check Mail Transfer Agent Strict Transport Security.

title: TLS-RPT Lookup
description: Check SMTP TLS Reporting records.

title: SMTP Test
description: Test connectivity to an email server's port 25/587.

title: Ping Test (TCP)
description: Measure latency to a server via TCP handshake.

title: Open Port Check
description: Check if a specific port is open on a server.

title: What Is My IP
description: Show your public IPv4/IPv6 and location info.

title: CIDR Calculator
description: Calculate IP range, netmask, and host count from CIDR.

title: MAC OUI Lookup
description: Identify manufacturer from MAC address.

title: ASN Lookup
description: Find Autonomous System Number details.

title: Service Banner Grabber
description: Capture the initial greeting from any service port.

title: SSL Certificate Checker
description: Analyze certificate chain, issuer, and expiry.

title: Security Headers Grade
description: Grade website security headers (HSTS, CSP).

title: HSTS Checker
description: Verify if Strict-Transport-Security is enabled.

title: CORS Checker
description: Inspect Access-Control-Allow-Origin headers.

title: Robots.txt Inspector
description: Fetch and parse a website's robots.txt file.

title: Sitemap Locator
description: Check if a sitemap.xml exists.

title: HTTP Headers
description: View raw server response headers.

title: Redirect Tracer
description: Trace the full path of URL redirects.

title: Whois Lookup
description: Query domain registration ownership.

title: IP Blacklist Check
description: Check if an IP is listed on spam RBLs.

title: JSON Formatter
description: Validate and beautify JSON data.

title: URL Encoder/Decoder
description: Encode or decode URL-safe strings.

title: Base64 Converter
description: Encode or decode Base64 strings.

title: JWT Decoder
description: Decode JSON Web Tokens (header & payload).

title: Punycode Converter
description: Convert Unicode domains to ASCII.

title: User Agent Parser
description: Parse a User-Agent string.

title: Unix Timestamp
description: Convert timestamps to human dates.

title: Hash Generator
description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 hashes.

title: HMAC Generator
description: Create Hash-based Message Auth Codes.

title: UUID Generator
description: Generate random UUID v4 and API keys.

title: Password Strength
description: Calculate entropy and strength estimate.

title: Password Generator
description: Generate secure random passwords.
